description: woman walking, seen from front; woman has long wavy hair and wears a gown with a slit in PL side, allowing a view of tall sandals; gown tied with a sash at waist; scooped neckline; PL arm at side; PR arm held away from body, with arm unfinished and hand out of picture plane; grey wash overall on background
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on back, in pencil: illegible inscriptions
medium: Black chalk, white gouache, and gray wash
provenance: [G. T. Seiden, Chiltern Street Gallery, London, until 1977; sold September 19, for $150, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1977-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Woman in a Neoclassical Dress
